languages: Understands the languages it knew before becoming a Wendigo, but cannot speak

abilities.name: Resistances
abilities.description: Cold, poison, bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical, nonsilvered weapons; charmed, exhausted, poisoned, frightened conditions

abilities.name: Ambush Predator
abilities.description: The Wendigo has advantage on attack rolls made against a surprised creature or a creature that cannot see it.

abilities.name: Mimicry
abilities.description: The Wendigo can mimic sounds it has heard, including voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful DC 16 Wisdom (Insight) check

abilities.name: Masks of the Wild
abilities.description: The Wendigo can attempt to hide even when it is only lightly obscured by foilage, heavy rain, falling snow, must, or or other natural phenomena.

abilities.name: Cunning Action
abilities.description: The Wendigo can Dash, Disengage, or Hide as a Bonus action.

abilities.name: Punce
abilities.description: If the Wendigo moves at least 20 feet in a straight line toward a creature then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is knocked prone, the Wendigo can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

name: Wendigo

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The Wendigo makes two attacks, only one of which can be a bite attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description:
Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target
Hit: 2d8 + 4 piercing damage. On a hit, the target must must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or take an additional 2d8 necrotic damage

actions.name: Claws
actions.description:
Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target
Hit: 2d6 + 4 slashing damage
